attributes.action: put greater force on the un-employed to find work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's anoying when most of us have to work hard to make a living when others just live off the state.  Which basically means I am paying for someone not to work.

Why arn't the government doing more to make un-employed people find work.

Surly its quite simply - if you work you pay taxes and you don't have to pay that person benefits.  Win-win for the government.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
